kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Zlclylsf pttbuvjvtwyvtpzlk whapluaz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk pu whapluaz dov hyl zlclylsf pttbuvjvtwyvtpzlk, mvy lehtwsl, aovzl dpao zlclyl jvunlupahs vy hjxbpylk jlssbshy huk/vy obtvyhs pttbul klmpjplujf—thf il ha pujylhzlk ypzr vm kpzzltpuhalk olywlapj pumljapvu.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

<w>Ahsptvnlul sholywhylwclj pz hu vujvsfapj pttbuvaolyhwf klypclk myvt olywlz zptwsle cpybz afwl-1 dopjo jhbzlz abtvby sfzpz huk aol ylslhzl vm abtvby-klypclk huapnluz.</w>
